title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 148.1 - Coverage
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 148.1 - Coverage

State Regulations

This Part shall apply to all annual salaried employees in the

Administrative Services, Institutional Services and Operational Services
negotiating units whose positions have been allocated to salary grades or are
unallocated but are equated to salary grades by the Director of the Budget. Excluded from coverage are those employees paid on other than an annual
basis. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
148.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
